Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We are going to create two POWL models as per the description. First, we note the key activities from the description: ReceiveApplication, DataCompletenessCheck, RequestMoreInfo, SkillAssessment, CulturalFitCheck, CommunityAffiliationCheck, ManagerialReview, FinalDecision

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The loop structure is modeled as OperatorPOWL with LOOP between DataCompletenessCheck and RequestMoreInfo to handle missing information until complete

Name: Inductive Reasoning - IND
Text: The process flow is sequential with potential XOR at cultural fit step based on the description of branching for affiliations

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: For model 1 with unfairness, after SkillAssessment use XOR between CulturalFitCheck and CommunityAffiliationCheck to show biased branch

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: For model 2 without unfairness, after SkillAssessment use single CulturalFitCheck with no XOR branch

Name: Validation - PE
Text: The overall structure uses StrictPartialOrder to sequence ReceiveApplication, loop, SkillAssessment, cultural fit step, ManagerialReview, FinalDecision ensuring order matches description

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Code construction defines transitions, creates operator nodes for loop and XOR where needed, builds root StrictPartialOrder, and adds order edges for sequential flow
